movie.title: Pusher
movie.description_intro: Frank is a drug pusher on the roll until he makes a huge deal with dope that he hasn't paid for and he gets busted by the police. He manages to dump the dope in a nearby lake but he owes his supplier a lot of money (not a nice guy to owe money to). Now we follow Frank in his quest to raise money in the underworld of Copenhagen.
movie.description_full: Frank is a drug pusher on the roll until he makes a huge deal with dope that he hasn't paid for and he gets busted by the police. He manages to dump the dope in a nearby lake but he owes his supplier a lot of money (not a nice guy to owe money to). Now we follow Frank in his quest to raise money in the underworld of Copenhagen.

movies.title: Million Dollar Arm
movies.summary: In 2008, J. B. Bernstein is a sports agent who finds his business being seriously outplayed by his deep-pocketed competitors. Inspired by reality shows and Indian cricket games on TV, Bernstein gets the bold idea of finding cricket players in India and training them to become pro baseball players in America. After a long search, Bernstein finds two talented, but non-cricket playing, youths, Rinku Singh and Dinesh Patel. Together, Berthstein takes his prospects to Los Angeles where they find mastering a new sport in a foreign land a daunting challenge. As these boys struggle amid an alien culture, Bernstein must find a way to make their dream come true. In doing, Bernstein finds a deeper humanity to his work with growing friendships he never expected to have.

In doing, Bernstein finds a deeper humanity to his work with growing friendships he never expected to have.

movies.title: Power of Attorney
movies.summary: An attorney is hired to defend a notorious mobster which he has been trying to send away for years while working as a prosecutor.
movies.description_full: An attorney is hired to defend a notorious mobster which he has been trying to send away for years while working as a prosecutor.
movies.synopsis: An attorney is hired to defend a notorious mobster which he has been trying to send away for years while working as a prosecutor.

movies.title: Angel Dog
movies.summary: This heartwarming film is about a dog named Cooper who is the lone survivor of a terrible car accident. Jake, a family patriarch, loses his wife and children in the accident. Not being a dog person, Jake is angry and resentful toward the dog for even surviving. However, eventually Jake bonds with Cooper, and this bond ends up being the one thing that gets him out of bed in the morning, the one thing that helps him to go on living after such a tragic loss.

movies.title: Warpath
movies.summary: Alice travels west along with a ruthless bounty hunter in search of her lost husband.
movies.description_full: Alice travels west along with a ruthless bounty hunter in search of her lost husband.
